subject: Basketball
Executives and Management
Coaches and Managers
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: As the N.B.A.’s trading season grinded to a halt, Coach Isiah Thomas was left with nothing to sell Friday but well-worn rhetoric.
snippet: As the N.B.A.’s trading season grinded to a halt, Coach Isiah Thomas was left with nothing to sell Friday but well-worn rhetoric.
